dcterms:description: A dataset containing 148 color fundus images from both healthy and diabetic retinopathy subjects, with optic disc and hard exudate segmentation masks. Fovea localization was manually performed. The dataset is split into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: Indian Diabetic Retinopathy Image Dataset (IDRiD)

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 62 color fundus images from both healthy and diabetic retinopathy subjects, with hard exudate segmentation masks. Optic disc segmentation and fovea localization were manually performed. The dataset is split into training, validation, and test sets.
dcterms:title: eOphtha Dataset
